attributes.additional_details:
Daley Thomson inspired the nation during the 1980s and is still remembered today as an all time great, Thomson is regarded as a national treasure by many and should be recognized with a knighthood for his achievements.

Medals;
Olympic Games
1980 Gold    	
1984 Gold
World Championships	
1983 Gold 
European Championships
1982 Gold  	
1986 Gold     
1978 Silver   	
1986 4×100 m Bronze 	
Commonwealth Games
1978 Gold   
1982 Gold  	
1986 Gold   	
1986 4×100 m  Silver
attributes.background: Daley Thomson is arguably the most successful decathlete of all time breaking the world record for the event four times and wining gold in two different Olympic Games, three different Commonwealth Games and the World Championships.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour.
 
Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: 
 
https://www.gov.uk/honours
